ComicInfo.Summary: Jim gets a crash course in the 'Curse of the Spawn' as he and Twitch from a temporary alliance. Jim wants answers; what is his connection to a dead man named Al Simmons? And why has he been given the powers of a Hellspawn? Twitch needs Jim to save Sam's life - a task far more complex and dangerous than either can imagine.
